EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-Public Sector-Email-eDM invite to FIC-T001O4.21800.Thank you email - LTE
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for visiting Nokia at FIC 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Thank you for visiting Nokia at FIC 2018 It was a pleasure to meet and talk with you about cybersecurity challenges and show you some of our latest innovations.
This year, Nokia presented solutions that:
- Protect mission-critical networks from quantum computing attacks - Secure sensors and traffic from IoT-based services - Use SDN technology to automate network security
We hope they captured your interest. Our sales representative is at your disposal if you need more information.
We are also pleased to share with you our latest white paper <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201836]]> about cybersecuring mission-critical networks. Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
